raven_speed.desc: Standard raven speed. Can be affected by weather or predators.

horse_speed_sustained.desc: Sustainable pace for a horse on a road.

army_march_speed.desc: Standard march speed for a large host.

resurrection.desc: Only death can pay for life. Requires blood magic or divine intervention.

warging.desc: Easier with bonded animal. Distance weakens connection.

dragons.desc: Dragons never stop growing as long as they have food and freedom.

communication.desc: No instant communication. Ravens are the fastest method.

medicine.desc: Milk of the poppy for pain. Amputation for infection. No antibiotics.
